name: Document Controller O&G
description:
Duties:
  • Control and monitor the flows of documentation delivery to the Client and related approvals;
  • Project implementation of the Project Distribution Matrix; In the case of hard copy documents, scan them;
  • Insert documents in electronic format into document management programs;
  • Verification of the formal congruence of the documentation produced by the disciplines and by the Vendors with the company, project and contract requirements in close
  • coordination with the technical disciplines;
  • Preparation of coding for project documents in collaboration with the Project Control Manager and the engineering PSL;
  • Manage the “Document Register and the Master data List” of activities; Prepare the necessary copies of the documents to be sent (CD and / or hard copies);
  • Issue, registration and distribution of documents to the recipients involved (through relevant programs) via email and / or in paper format; Issue transmittals for all incoming and outgoing documents

Requirements:

  • Вachelor degree
  • Experience 1 - 2 years
  • EDMS
  • O&G
  • English: upper-intermediate
Conditions:
  • Schedule 6/1 - Saturday till 3 pm.
  • Location: Moscow Oil Refinery in Kapotnya
